title: The Alpha Client.
body:
Anybody here, who hasn't gotten into the new alpha client wanna know what it looks like? 
They haven't released the full data for it, all they have is some basic pages.
They have looks for the main page, chat, profile page (Only 1)
And normal, summoners rift and ARAM.

I do have some issues with it, like its really slow for starters. But its new its to be expected.
I'm editing a video on it now, will post it sometime later. 
So then you can actually see what it looks like and how it acts.
